name: Indian Engineers
overview:
Indian Engineers & Fabricators started journey way back in the year 2003, as a sole proprietorship unit. At the onset, the journey was ardent and gave lot of hiccups.

Products & Services: Industrial Control Panels Industrial Control Panel Systems Industrial Electrical Control Panels Auto PF Panels Generators Panels Motor Control Centre Panels Power Control Centre Panels AMF Panels Outdoor Panels Fabrication Services Maintenance Services

Infrastructure: At our facility we have the best of machines used across the globe, which adds to our strength. Enjoying the outstanding infrastructure, we are all the more committed in delivering excellence in our product range. This adds to the brand value Indian Engineers & Fabricators, and helps us to gain a foothold in the market.

Our Team: We have got some 25 highly skilled and motivated professionals who work with tremendous amount of dedication and have helped the company to scale new heights. The team is constantly involved in producing quality-oriented products at the same time they are also keeping themselves abreast with industry advancements.

Our Quality Assurance: During this process flow, we follow end-to-end quality management, so that we are able to keep the standard of our products. We strive hard to roll out the best products, which are quality approved, in turn bring laurels for the company. Following this practice we have positioned ourselves as the leader in the existing market and have earned a good respect all across the market.

Our Clients: More than decade has passed and the list has never receded in terms of clients. We enjoy a fairly large share of clientele and good market repo tire in the market. Our clients keep coming back to us as we are able e to serve in the best possible and thereby establishing ourselves as a client centric company.

Why Us?;
We are one of the renowned manufacturer, supplier and service provider of a wide range of Industrial panels, generator panels and many more. The client appreciated us due to the following reasons: Timely delivery High quality products Affordable prices
